history.proof: intros n x H. destruct x eqn:E. - reflexivity. - rewrite <- H. destruct n. + discriminate. + hauto lq: on use: tech_mult_neg_posZ, tech_mult_pos_negZ, tech_integ_posZ, mult_mIZ, tech_mult_neg_negZ, tech_pos_not_posZ, multZ_eq4, tech_opp_pos_negZ. - destruct n. + simpl in H. discriminate. + hauto l: on use: tech_mult_neg_negZ.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros n x H. destruct x eqn:E. - reflexivity. - rewrite <- H. destruct n. + simpl in E. discriminate. + simpl in E. injection E as E'. rewrite E'. reflexivity. - destruct n. + simpl in H. discriminate. + simpl in H. discriminate.
